example.text: President Biden has all the tools to secure the border. He just needs to do his job. [[url]]

Protecting Student Athletes and Scholastic Competition: As a former college football coach, Senator Tuberville wants to ensure student athletes are protected and college sports are preserved following a US Supreme Court ruling allowing student athletes receiving compensation for the use of their name, image, and likeness (NIL). Senator Tuberville teamed up with Senator Joe Manchin (D-WV) to solicit feedback from stakeholders that will be used to draft bipartisan NIL legislation next year.

Standing up for Financial Freedom: Senator Tuberville championed legislation prohibiting retirement plan financial advisors from investing the savings of Americans based on woke, non-financial environmental, social, and governance (ESG) factors. To from receiving my newsletters, click here .

Over 10,000 migrants were apprehended Monday and Tuesday, marking the highest single-day totals ever recorded. But this is NOTHING compared to the tidal wave that is about to hit our country tomorrow because of Joe Biden. #BidenBorderCrisis [[url]]

Senator Tuberville also pushed for President Biden to ban Russian companies from the US financial system to ensure American investors are not inadvertently funding Russia's war against Ukraine. Listening to Needs of Agriculture Community: Senator Tuberville began listening sessions and roundtables with farmers and industry leaders in advance of the upcoming Farm Bill reauthorization.
